successes.title: GCW-Zero: Open Source Gaming Handheld
successes.description:
An Open Source Gaming Console 
Built by Gamers for Gamers...

Pledges.description: Small donations can be a big deal. Chip in a few bucks, and our team will send you a personal thank you note.
Plus, you'll feel all cuddly knowing that you're supporting open source game development!
Donations can be a SUPER Big deal. Chip in a few bucks, and our team will send you a personal thank you note and a GCW Zero logo Decal.
Plus, you'll feel all cuddly knowing that you're supporting open source game development!
You're awesome. and so is the Zero. So put the Zero on your awesome self.
People will see you and wonder "who is that attractive person wearing the T-shirt of that highly successful Kickstarter project?"
